examples.text: Osman kuvvetli bir ilâç yaptı. Bu, lâakal insani altı saat deliksiz uyutacak bir ilâçtı.
examples.translation: Osman created a powerful drug. It was a drug that could put someone to sleep for at least six hours straight.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish لااقل (laakal), from Arabic عَلَى اَلْأَقَلّ (ʕalā l-ʔaqall).
